dt-api.name: colReorder.move()

type.parameter: New index to move the column to.
Indicate that this is the final move. Set this to `false` if you are performing multiple moves.

Invalidate the row data. As with `drop` it can be useful to set this to `false` if performing multiple moves. Otherwise allow it to default which will ensure that the table's data is fully insync with the column order.

dt-api.description: This method provides the ability to programmatically change the order of one column at a time (while `-api colReorder.order()` will set the order of all columns together).

example.title: Move the first column in the table to the second position
